NAME: Gaurav Kumar
ABOUT:
I am a highly ambitious and performance driven Senior Software Developer who loves learning new technologies.
I am the fellow that people bank upon to solve their most challenging technical problems.  My career is marked by:

•      7 years’ experience in design and development of highly concurrent and scalable cross  platform products.
•      Development of data collection platform for GHost software that runs on 244,000 machines.
•      End to end development of cross platform multithreaded EDA tool in QT C++ that scaled 
        the performance from its Perl counterpart by 25 times.
•      Winning Best Paper Presentation award at National Instrument's annual tech conference 
        NITech for developing and demonstrating an automation tool in C# that generated source 
        code with a single click of button using single source JSON data and reduced time of 
        development from 3 months to couple of minutes.
•      Proficiency in C/C++/Java, Data Structures and Algorithms.
•      Experience in developing stand alone applications and DLLs in C#/VB.NET.
•      Experience in working on scripting languages such as Python and Perl. 
•      Hands on programming experience with multi-threaded applications.
•      Experience in wrting detailed and regressive testcases on test platforms like Google-Test,QT, 
         Microsoft .NET Unit Test Framework and Boost Test Suite. 
•      Experience in CI Tools like Jenkins.
•      Experience in parsing file formats like JSON and XML.
•      Active in competitive programming in Topcoder,Codeforces.
